title: Andy Warhol Memory Game
description:
Soup's on!  Keep your cognitive acuity in check with this memory game inspired by Andy Warhol's (American, 1928-1987) iconic soup can.  Each game contains a set of 20 cards.  Match the coordinating colors to win.  Made with recycled paper. 

Card size, 7 1/4 x 3 1/3 in. 
Box size, 4 3/4 x 7 1/2 x 2 1/2 in.
